nodes.text: Thisspiasian was the native language of the Thisspiasian species from Thisspias.
Thisspiasian was a complex language that used interlocking sentences. From a phonological perspective, it makes a heavy use of sibilants (including s, z and derivates like sh).
Most Thisspiasians were fluent in both Thisspiasian language and Basic, although they were only literate in their own language.
Notable non-native speakers of Thisspiasian language
